body_html:
No, on windows situation has not changed. Libraries under tools still have POSIX dependencies, that are still unavailable on windows. I do not expect the situation to change.
For the onnx converter, please reach out to the owners of the repository/tool, as we do not own it.
All I can recommend from TF side is as @angersson suggested, to use linux or macos.

body:
No, on windows situation has not changed. Libraries under tools still have POSIX dependencies, that are still unavailable on windows. I do not expect the situation to change.
For the onnx converter, please reach out to the owners of the repository/tool, as we do not own it.
All I can recommend from TF side is as @angersson suggested, to use linux or macos.
